Context:
The International Student Advisors at George Brown College offer in-person appointments and walk-in support. The contact details for the advisors are as follows:
- Michelle Choimchoi (students in certain schools and centres): michelle.choimchoi@georgebrown.ca
- Van Chieng (students in certain centres): van.chieng@georgebrown.ca
- Min-Jeong (MJ) Kimm (students in certain schools): mj.kimm@georgebrown.ca
- Mariana Razzak (students in certain schools and centres): mariana.razzak@georgebrown.ca
- Grace Yi (students in certain centres): grace.yi@georgebrown.ca

The contact number for general queries is 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559. The email address for queries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

George Brown College has a Social Media Hub that can be visited. The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
